description:
Stick to routes with the tenacity of an 8-legged bug. The comfort-focused Tarantula has an unlined leather upper that moulds to the shape of your foot, with a higher shoe volume and rounded forefoot for all-day performance. The stiff midsole and sticky FriXion rubber provides support and grip on both plastic and rock foot holds.

  • Unlined leather uppers are comfortable for all-day cragging and long hours in the gym
  • Slightly asymmetric shape balances comfort and performance
  • Long lasting sticky FriXion® rubber sticks to plastic and rock equally well
  • La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size
name: La Sportiva Tarantula Rock Shoes - Men's
